physical_appearance: This is a gold headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The scalloped-shape base is designed to fit the head. The front of the headdress features floral-like star-burst motifs amidst wire scrolls and arabesques. The border, as well as the floral design, is embedded with diamonds. The gold gilding is slightly faded.
title_text: Gilded Wedding Crown set with Diamantes
subject_terms_1: folk costume wedding clothes floral (motif) scrolls (motifs) customs (social concepts)
subject_terms_2: Headdresses Ethnic costume Wedding costume Motifs Manners and customs Malays (Asian people)
